server.name: io.github.HeshamFS/mcp-tool-factory
server.description: Generate MCP servers from natural language, OpenAPI specs, or database schemas.

environmentVariables.description: Anthropic Claude API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)
environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Claude Code OAuth token (one of the 4 provider keys is required)
environmentVariables.name: CLAUDE_CODE_OAUTH_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI GPT API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
